quote: Playing with different genres and perspectives and ways of telling stories is one of the perks of being a novelist, but at the same time, I want precision. And in order to be precise about stuff, you have to get personal. Symbolism is very boring.
I want to play a variety of different characters in different genres of film.

Music is a big part of my life. I listen to different genres, and I choose the music that will inspire the next part of my story.
